quote: It's okay not to be okay.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Unknown

quote: Where there is love, there is life.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
author: Unknown

quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: I am not lazy, I am on energy saving mode.
author: Unknown

quote: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you', but how much you prove that it's true.
author: Unknown

quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
author: Unknown

quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
author: Unknown

quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
author: Unknown

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Unknown

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: Unknown

quote: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: Unknown

quote: Whatever you do, do it well.
author: Unknown

quote: What we think, we become.
author: Unknown

quote: All limitations are self-imposed.
author: Unknown

quote: Tough times never last but tough people do.
author: Unknown

quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Unknown

quote: One day the people that don’t even believe in you will tell everyone how they met you.
author: Unknown

quote: Determine your priorities and focus on them.
author: Unknown

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.
author: Unknown

quote: Yesterday you said tomorrow. Just do it.
author: Unknown

quote: I don’t need it to be easy, I need it to be worth it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t you know your imperfections is a blessing?
author: Unknown

quote: Reality is wrong, dreams are for real.
author: Unknown

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud.
author: Unknown

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Unknown

quote: Strive for greatness.
author: Unknown

quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are.
author: Unknown

quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.
author: Unknown

quote: A happy soul is the best shield for a cruel world.
author: Unknown

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Unknown

quote: Change the game, don’t let the game change you.
author: Unknown

quote: It's okay to struggle, but it's never okay to give up on yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
author: Unknown

quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
author: Unknown

quote: Real friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Unknown

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Unknown

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Unknown

quote: Silence is the most powerful scream.
author: Unknown

quote: Be strong, because things will get better. It may be stormy now, but it never rains forever.
author: Unknown

quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
author: Unknown

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: Unknown

quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Unknown

quote: Talking about our problems is our greatest addiction. Break the habit. Talk about your joys.
author: Unknown

quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I.
author: Unknown

quote: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is like peeing on yourself: everyone can see it, but only you get the warm feeling that it brings.
author: Unknown

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Unknown

quote: Health is not just about what you're eating. It's also about what you're thinking and saying.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you,' but how much you prove that it's true.
author: Unknown

quote: A true friend sees the first tear, catches the second, and stops the third.
author: Unknown

quote: Push today for what you want tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: My therapist told me the way to achieve true inner peace is to finish what I start. So far I’ve finished two bags of M&Ms and a chocolate cake. I feel better already.
author: Unknown

quote: You are not your illness. You have an individual story to tell.
author: Unknown

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: Unknown

quote: When you can’t find the sunshine, be the sunshine.
author: Unknown

quote: The grass is greener where you water it.
author: Unknown

quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
author: Unknown

quote: You always pass failure on the way to success.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s okay to look at the past and the future. Just don’t stare.
author: Unknown

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Unknown

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Unknown

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone else’s cloud.
author: Unknown

quote: Do not mind anything that anyone tells you about anyone else. Judge everyone and everything for yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Unknown

quote: The only journey is the journey within.
author: Unknown

quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
author: Unknown

quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
author: Unknown

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Unknown

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Unknown

quote: When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
author: Unknown

quote: The soul would have no rainbow if the eyes had no tears.
author: Unknown

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Unknown

quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: Unknown

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Unknown

quote: Try to be like the turtle – at ease in your own shell.

quote: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn’t know you left open.

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Unknown

quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
author: Unknown

quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.

quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
